text: I'm only saying my own words of course
hello America
this is the postman course today the
postman calls for Mrs Luis samparini
over Torrance California
Louis Zamperini is not missing and not
to that as erroneously announced by your
government
safe and sound with us
so keep listening Mrs samparini and
don't mention it pleasure is all ours
hello mother and father sisters and
friends
this is your Louie talking
and the first time in two years it will
have heard my voice
I am uninjured and in good health
I am now interned in a Tokyo prisoner of
war camp being treated as well as can be
expected under wartime conditions
I hope Pete is still able to pay you his
weekly visits from San Diego
and Dad
keep my guns in good condition so we can
go hunting when I get home
good rabbits for Mom's nail key sauce
I wish you all a Merry Christmas and a
Happy New Year
your loving son Louie
[Music]
